channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Dokan
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Dokan

item.title: CVE-2022-3194|2024-08-03T01:00:10.810Z -- unknown -- dokan
item.description: The Dokan WordPress plugin before 3.6.4 allows vendors to inject arbitrary javascript in product reviews, which may allow them to run stored XSS attacks against other users like site administrators.

item.title: CVE-2022-3915|2024-08-03T01:20:58.821Z -- unknown -- dokan
item.description: The Dokan WordPress plugin before 3.7.6 does not properly sanitise and escape a parameter before using it in a SQL statement, leading to a SQL injection exploitable by unauthenticated users
